about.intro1: Hello ðŸ‘‹ my name is Francel, a passionate frontend developer based in Montreal. I love turning ideas into fluid, accessible and visually engaging interfaces.
about.intro2: I mainly work with React, Typescript, Tailwind CSS and modern tools like Vite, Git and Figma. I'm very comfortable with REST and GraphQL APIs and have solid experience with databases like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
about.intro3: I also have strong backend skills thanks to my experience with Python, particularly Django. I'm rigorous, curious, and always seeking optimization. Outside of code, I enjoy music (like everyone, right?), football, and Iâ€™m still trying to be consistent at the gym.
